description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for an S3 bucket is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 location.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon S3 location.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URL of the Amazon S3 location that was described.

nested_items.name: S3StorageClass
nested_items.description: When Amazon S3 is a destination location, this is the storage class that you chose for your objects.

nested_items.name: BucketAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the IAM role that DataSync uses to access your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: AgentArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the DataSync agents deployed on your Outpost when using working with Amazon S3 on Outposts.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the Amazon S3 location was created.
